Hi Rob,

Just following up on this. Would you mind giving support a call?

We want to be helpful but are unsure on next steps.

1300 072 134

Thank you

Thanks Rob.

We can add the dropdown, but need to have the content pages for it.

We have this attached file, but the content is not categorized.
  • are the pages will have images?
  • do they have preferred layout for the pages to be created?

If you could share what you're looking for we can update this for you.

Thanks,
Andy

they sent this attached file, but the content is not categorized.
  • are the pages will have images?
  • do they have preferred layout for the pages to be created?

thanks
